name: cmcic
description: Payments module for CIC bank, Credit Mutuel and OBC Bank
author: Pierrick Paul <pierrick.paul@epitech.eu>

scripts.test: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha tests/runner.js --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
